Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that adds axil tilt to kerbin?

I know about real solar system, but i just want to add axial tilt to game, nothing more.

Please make such mod if it doesnt exist

There isn't, but you could make a config file for RSS that does it. It would rotate the orbits of all the planets around (so their axial tilts would be the same as Kerbin's).

In the stock game, all planets have the same axis of rotation, and it's kinda hardcoded into the game so not really possible to get around it with mods.

If any of the planet mods were able to do this, you'd be able to get it from the Real Solar System thread because that is an important realism point. KSP does not support it, unfortunately. It's something NathanKell looked into early.
Yeah. I asked Mu to add it (it has to be done on Squad's side, basically) so all we can do is contact Squad and ask them to add support for it.
